pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tidy Multiverse Analysis Made Simple // Extends 'multiverse' package (Sarma A., Kale A., Moon M., Taback N., Chevalier F., Hullman J., Kay M., 2021) doi:10.31219/osf.io/yfbwm, which allows users perform to create explorable multiverse analysis in R. This extension provides an additional level of abstraction to the 'multiverse' package with the aim of creating user friendly syntax to researchers, educators, and students in statistics. The 'mverse' syntax is designed to allow piping and takes hints from the 'tidyverse' grammar. The package allows users to define and inspect multiverse analysis using familiar syntax in R.
